body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Sharp Goodpasture. Father of Shelby Goodpasture, Felix Goodpasture, Judy Goodpasture, Marshall Goodpasture, and Louretta Goodpasture. Farmer in Bath County in 1860.
